7c2f448ad61f66224168d197dfc6195e7b8d9409.commitMessage: Issue #3989: UTs should not use ROOT locale when they test violation/error message

7caba87cc7113bf4484ca6046483a7a9bad58ec8.commitMessage: Issue #3896: Test failed due to locale message settings. (with non-English locale settings)

d6966ec1f74912d6bfe3bb1c68bf67436da23f7e.commitMessage: Fix no possibility to set English language explicitly in config. #152

672b27dd5551de63a1fb08d8ea80376d70f2aa60.commitMessage:
Moved all the Localization stuff into the api directory. The plan is reused
the localisation support in the checks.

25a13442f2d67729eba3b1e8eff32ed926396ee3.commitMessage:
Fixed bug (594469) where unit tests would fail under different locales. Also
fixed a potential bug on how messages are located.

20483ae032296610315fafb9a8774cfdd0e13857.commitMessage:
Major rework to support localized error messages. Inspired by patch 580410. At
the moment it is not possible to override the system locale, this probably
should be added.

Now possible to specify the locale to use.
